summary: A streetwise exorcist becomes an overnight sensation when his extraordinary exorcisms are recorded and go viral on the internet. However, this attracts not only the attention of the media but also creatures from the underworld.
cast: Nick Cheung|Amber Kuo|Louis Cheung|Sisley Choi|Angie Cheung|Jacky Cheung|Sam Ip|Philip Keung|Elena Kong|Kar Yan Lam|Andrew Lau|Jordan Seung-Yuen Lee|Lawrence Ng|Carmen Soup|Yu-Hong Wang|Chun-Fung Wong|Olivia Yan|Shawn Yue
title: Keeper of Darkness
